How do I get you to realize that the Mods aren't the devils' advocates?

How do I get you to realize that the banning of chobit-389 was for the greater good?

Show you how calmed down and civil the forum has become, especially thanks to the closing of several threads which did nothing but take up memory on the servers.

By shutting your eyes.

You fail

you can't it's impossibale...even if it's psychotic fluttershy
